quoteFirst: So the affairs of the world stood when the sun went down on the 15th of July. On the meridian of Aeria it set at
quoteLast: ; at thirteen minutes past eight, according to the calculations made by the Martian and verified by the Aerian astronomers, the herald of Fate would approach within the range of terrestrial vision.
title: Olga Romanoff
author: Griffith, George Chetwynd, 1857-1906; Jane, Fred T. (Frederick Thomas), 1865-1916 [Illustrator]
